KPK Berharap Presiden Pilih Dewas KPK yang Berintegritas
06 Nov 2019, 12:22 by Chairul Umam


KPK Berharap Presiden Pilih Dewas KPK yang Berintegritas

KBRN, Jakarta : Presiden Joko Widodo bakal melantik anggota Dewan Pengawas (Dewas) KPK bersamaan dengan komisioner KPK baru pada Desember mendatang. Terdengar beberapa nama kandidat Dewan Pengawas KPK yang akan diisi oleh Basuki Tjahja Purnama (Ahok) dan Antasari Azhar. Menanggapi hal tersebut, KPK melalui juru bicaranya Febri Diansyah, mengatakan yang terpenting dalam pemilihan dewan pengawas KPK adalah yang memiliki kapasitas dan integritas dalam pemberantasan korupsi. Untuk itu Febri menjelaskan KPK memberikan kepercayaan penuh kepada Presiden dalam memilih calon dewas KPK.
"Dewan Pengawas memang harus di bentuk dan di lantik bersamaan dengan pimpinan KPK yang baru, namun harapan utamanya orang - orang yang di pilih baik menjadi pimpinan, Dewan pengawas maupun pegawai KPK dapat memiliki kapasitas dan integritas dalam pemberantasan korupsi," kata Febri di gedung KPK, Rabu (6/11/2019).
Sementara itu Presiden Jokowi mengatakan tidak akan ada panitia seleksi (pansel) dalam pemilihan Dewan Pengawas KPK. Meski tidak melalui pansel dan pemilihan langsung ditunjuk oleh dirinya, Jokowi meminta masyarakat mempercayai pilihannya. Jokowi juga memastikan, nantinya yang terpilih merupakan sosok yang memiliki kredibilitas yang baik.
Diketahui anggota Dewan Pengawas KPK akan dipilih oleh Presiden Joko Widodo berdasarkan UU No. 19 tahun 2019 tentang KPK. Syarat yang harus dipenuhi calon anggota dewan pengawas, di antaranya tidak pernah dipidana, berusia minimal 55 tahun, berpendidikan paling rendah S1, tidak menjadi anggota partai politik serta punya integritas moral dan keteladanan.

KPK Hopes President To Choose Dewas KPK with Integrity
Nov 6 2019, 12:22 by Chairul Umam


KPK Hopes President To Choose Dewas KPK with Integrity

KBRN, Jakarta: President Joko Widodo will inaugurate members of the KPK Supervisory Board (Dewas) together with new KPK commissioners in December. Some names of the KPK Supervisory Board candidates will be heard by Basuki Tjahja Purnama (Ahok) and Antasari Azhar. Responding to this, the KPK through its spokesman Febri Diansyah, said that the most important thing in the election of the KPK's supervisory board is that it has the capacity and integrity in fighting corruption. For this reason, Febri explained that the KPK gave full confidence to the President in choosing candidates for KPK death.
"The Supervisory Board indeed has to be formed and appointed along with the new KPK leadership, but the main hope is that those who are elected as leaders, the Supervisory Board and KPK employees can have the capacity and integrity to eradicate corruption," said Febri in the KPK building , Wednesday (11/06/2019).
Meanwhile President Jokowi said there would be no selection committee (pansel) in the election of the KPK Supervisory Board. Even though he did not go through the selection committee and direct election was appointed by him, Jokowi asked the public to trust his choice. Jokowi also ensured that the person chosen was someone who had good credibility.
It is known that the members of the KPK Supervisory Board will be elected by President Joko Widodo based on Law No. 19 of 2019 concerning the KPK. Requirements that must be met by prospective members of the supervisory board, including those who have never been convicted, are at least 55 years old, have the lowest undergraduate education, are not members of political parties and have moral integrity and ideals.
